CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for bulk custom access
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow a Glint Admin to apply custom access in bulk through Roles

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service for bulk custom access
OldVersion.description: This feature will allow a Glint Admin to apply custom access in bulk through Roles

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to relink surveys
CurrentVersion.description: This feature will allow an Admin to specify a closing date and time for a survey.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Glint - Self service to relink surveys
OldVersion.description: Improved self service; Ability to relink surveys to programs in progress

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall
CurrentVersion.description: Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Message Recall
OldVersion.description: Exchange Online's Cloud-based Message Recall feature will be coming to Outlook for Mac.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses
CurrentVersion.description: Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses hosted at SuccessFactors can be displayed at Viva Learning.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses
OldVersion.description: Private thumbnail using SharePoint links for courses hosted at SuccessFactors can be displayed at Viva Learning.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use a URL to reference supported files in Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Users can copy and paste a link of a supported file into the Draft with Copilot UI as a reference instead of searching for it in the file reference menu.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use a URL to reference supported files in Copilot in Word
OldVersion.description: Users can copy and paste a link of a supported file into the Draft with Copilot UI as a reference instead of searching for it in the file reference menu.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table, which generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
OldVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table, which generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
OldVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
CurrentVersion.description:
Description & title updated to address a publishing issue, correct description as follows: Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud--including emails and meetings--resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft365copilotblog/what%E2%80%99s-new-in-microsoft-365-copilot-in-word-at-ignite-2024/4303448

OldVersion.title: Reference data from the Microsoft cloud when drafting with Copilot in Word
OldVersion.description:
Description & title updated to address a publishing issue, correct description as follows: Draft with Copilot will support attaching rich content from the Microsoft cloud--including emails and meetings--resulting in content that's more contextually relevant.
More info: https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/blog/microsoft365copilotblog/what%E2%80%99s-new-in-microsoft-365-copilot-in-word-at-ignite-2024/4303448

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
CurrentVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Use Draft with Copilot in Word based on text, list, or table selection
OldVersion.description: Use Draft with Copilot in Word with the on-canvas Copilot menu when a user selects text, a list, or a table. This generates new content from Copilot and provides a richer, more interactive experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Bing search integration brings the power of the web to your chats in Word
OldVersion.description: Ask Copilot a question in Word chat and Copilot generates an answer using the power of integrated Bing search. And you never have to leave the app.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot + Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot + Designer in Word
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Word – Customize Copilot in Word responses with Personalization profiles
CurrentVersion.description: Personalization profiles allow users to customize the way Copilot responds to their prompts. It considers user preferences, interests, and other information to give users a more personalized experience.  This item is being removed from the roadmap as it is no longer accurate.  We apologize for the inconvenience.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Word – Customize Copilot in Word responses with Personalization profiles
OldVersion.description: Personalization profiles allow users to customize the way Copilot responds to their prompts. It considers user preferences, interests, and other information to give users a more personalized experience.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
CurrentVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document rather than operating on the entire document.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
OldVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document rather than operating on the entire document.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: DocuSign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also DocuSign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by DocuSign and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: DocuSign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
OldVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also DocuSign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by DocuSign and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Adobe Acrobat Sign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
CurrentVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also Adobe Acrobat sign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by Adobe and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: Adobe Acrobat Sign Integration with SharePoint eSignature
OldVersion.description: SharePoint users who are also Adobe Acrobat sign customers can initiate eSignatures directly from PDF documents. The eSignature request will be processed by Adobe and a copy of the signed document will be automatically saved in SharePoint after signing. This reduces the risks of potential data leakage that customers often report as they move sensitive documents between SharePoint and 3rd party eSignature platforms. Manual download or upload of documents will no longer be required when initiating the request or when saving the signed documents back to SharePoint for long term storage.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Find the perfect visual with Copilot and Designer in Word
OldVersion.description: Copilot in Word now integrates with Designer to help you find the perfect image or create a banner to bring your document to life.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
OldVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
CurrentVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Sensitivity label grouping modernization
OldVersion.description: To help improve label usability and configuration, the sensitivity labeling scheme will be simplified to only consist of labels and label groupings. These new label groupings allow admins to better organize and categorize their labels (previously done via parent labels).

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium Content Query - Columns in new libraries are queryable
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, columns in newly created libraries by licensed users are all made available to content query. Also, users can trigger an action to make all columns in existing libraries available to content query.

OldVersion.title: SharePoint: SharePoint Premium Content Query - Columns in new libraries are queryable
OldVersion.description: With this update, columns in newly created libraries by licensed users are all made available to content query. Also, users can trigger an action to make all columns in existing libraries available to content query.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
CurrentVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document, rather than operating in large part against the entire document.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Summary in Chat support for document text selection
OldVersion.description: Summary requests in chat can be limited to operate only on the user-selected text in the document, rather than operating in large part against the entire document.

CurrentVersion.title: Word: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Start a new document using up to three files
CurrentVersion.description: No need to start from scratch. Copilot can create your new document based on three different Word or PowerPoint files. In "Draft with Copilot," select Reference a file and choose up to three files that Copilot should use when creating the new document. Or, in "Compose," type "/" and the name of the file you'd like to use.  You can only use files you have permission to access in your organization's SharePoint or OneDrive.

OldVersion.title: Word: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365) – Start a new document using up to three files
OldVersion.description: No need to start from scratch. Copilot can create your new document based on three different Word or PowerPoint files. In "Draft with Copilot," select Reference a file and choose up to three files that Copilot should use when creating the new document. Or, in "Compose," type "/" and the name of the file you'd like to use.  You can only use files you have permission to access in your organization's SharePoint or OneDrive.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
CurrentVersion.description: Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning – Edit Learning Paths in Viva Learning
OldVersion.description: Admin will be able to edit learning paths metadata and content. Latest updates will be shown to learner after the LP is edited.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Defender for Office 365: Create allow directly in Tenant Allow/Block List
OldVersion.description: Admins can create an allow inside the Tenant Allow/Block List to override bulk, spam, and regular confidence phish verdicts directly.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Import HRIS data in Viva Glint from Microsoft Admin Center
CurrentVersion.description: Customers will be able to use various connectors to HRIS tools to import HRIS data into Viva Glint from Microsoft Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Import HRIS data in Viva Glint from Microsoft Admin Center
OldVersion.description: Customers will be able to use various connectors to HRIS tools to import HRIS data into Viva Glint from Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New policy for voice and face enrollment defaulting to 'On'
CurrentVersion.description: The new policy gives IT admins enhanced flexibility with distinct settings for voice and face enrollment. This adjustment provides greater control over managing these features, allowing organizations to tailor to their needs. Voice and face enrollment will be enabled by default, enabling voice isolation and speaker recognition in meeting rooms and enhancing intelligent meeting recaps and Copilot for meetings.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: New policy for voice and face enrollment defaulting to 'On'
OldVersion.description: The new policy gives IT admins enhanced flexibility with distinct settings for voice and face enrollment. This adjustment provides greater control over managing these features, allowing organizations to tailor to their needs. Voice and face enrollment will be enabled by default, enabling voice isolation and speaker recognition in meeting rooms and enhancing intelligent meeting recaps and Copilot for meetings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated Hyperlink Insertion
CurrentVersion.description: You can now insert a hyperlink in your chat message text in fewer clicks. Select the text you want to display and paste the URL, without needing to use the traditional hyperlink dialog box.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Updated Hyperlink Insertion
OldVersion.description: You can now insert a hyperlink in your chat message text in fewer clicks. Select the text you want to display and paste the URL, without needing to use the traditional hyperlink dialog box.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set workplace presence to the building level in Teams
CurrentVersion.description: When you connect to peripherals in a bring your own device (BYOD) room or at a bookable desk, your workplace presence in Teams will automatically be set to the building level (if you and your admin have given permission), simplifying coordination with others and enabling AI-assisted booking in the future.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Automatically set workplace presence to the building level in Teams
OldVersion.description: When you connect to peripherals in a bring your own device (BYOD) room or at a bookable desk, your workplace presence in Teams will automatically be set to the building level (if you and your admin have given permission), simplifying coordination with others and enabling AI-assisted booking in the future.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview supports inheriting sensitivity labels from shared files to Teams meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: For Microsoft 365 E5 and Teams Premium customers, we are making it easier to leverage sensitivity labels from Microsoft Purview Information Protection to help set the right protection settings to meetings. Admins can now set a label inheritance policy for meeting, so that when an attendee shares a file that has a higher sensitivity than the meeting itself in meeting chat or via Live share, the meeting's sensitivity can be updated either automatically or via a recommendation to the organizer, to match with the sensitivity of the shared file.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Microsoft Purview supports inheriting sensitivity labels from shared files to Teams meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description: For Microsoft 365 E5 and Teams Premium customers, we are making it easier to leverage sensitivity labels from Microsoft Purview Information Protection to help set the right protection settings to meetings. Admins can now set a label inheritance policy for meeting, so that when an attendee shares a file that has a higher sensitivity than the meeting itself in meeting chat or via Live share, the meeting's sensitivity can be updated either automatically or via a recommendation to the organizer, to match with the sensitivity of the shared file.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Optional connected experiences privacy setting
CurrentVersion.description: This rollout introduces the privacy setting for "Allow the use of additional optional connected experiences in Office" in Outlook on the web which is available in other Office apps today. The setting is found under Settings > General > Privacy and data > Privacy settings.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Optional connected experiences privacy setting
OldVersion.description: This rollout introduces the privacy setting for "Allow the use of additional optional connected experiences in Office" in Outlook on the web which is available in other Office apps today. The setting is found under Settings > General > Privacy and data > Privacy settings.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Forms Copilot can now help you collect responses on your forms
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot in Forms can now help you monitor and collect responses for your forms, so you can get the data you need on time. Copilot can send invitations, track your progress, and recommend follow-up actions such as reminders. Say goodbye to manual follow-ups and hello to smarter, stress-free data collection.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer
CurrentVersion.description: Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Endpoint Data Loss Prevention - Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer
OldVersion.description: Endpoint DLP should show full path of target domain and not just the domain name in Activity Explorer.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Delegates can now create new categories for the account owner's Calendar
CurrentVersion.description: Delegates can now create new categories on behalf of the person who granted them permissions. They can also apply said categories to the Calendar of that same person who granted them permissions. Delegates can view the list of the delegator's Categories by visiting the Accounts > Categories page of the Settings window and selecting the delegator's account from the dropdown. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Delegates can now create new categories for the account owner's Calendar
OldVersion.description: Delegates can now create new categories on behalf of the person who granted them permissions. They can also apply said categories to the Calendar of that same person who granted them permissions. Delegates can view the list of the delegator's Categories by visiting the Accounts > Categories page of the Settings window and selecting the delegator's account from the dropdown. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Category management for delegates
CurrentVersion.description: This allows mailbox owners to grant category management to delegates when sharing a calendar. #newoutlookforwindows

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Category management for delegates
OldVersion.description: This allows mailbox owners to grant category management to delegates when sharing a calendar. #newoutlookforwindows

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Direct Routing Call Troubleshooting via SIP Ladder
CurrentVersion.description: We are launching the SIP Ladder diagram tool in Teams Admin center to enable admins to troubleshoot their Direct Routing calls in a self-serve way. This feature will be available via the Usage reports page under Teams Admin center. It will also enable admins to view the SIP requests, responses and associated SDP data between Microsoft teams proxy and the SBC through which the call was routed. This data will be available for all calls made more than 30 minutes and less than 30 days ago.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Learning - Copilot Academy availability to all Microsoft 365 users
CurrentVersion.description: Copilot Academy will be accessible to users without Copilot licenses. Admins will have the option to select their preferred access settings for Copilot Academy.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
CurrentVersion.description: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.

OldVersion.title: Outlook: Support for AppleScript in the New Outlook for Mac
OldVersion.description: AppleScript is a language used to automate the actions of the MacOS and many of its applications. We will add support for this feature in the new Outlook for Mac.
